sentences.english: Heard this words, connect I scold the oneself shameless, what way of thinking.

sentences.english: This example indicates a new way of finding new insecticidal crystal protein.

sentences.english: The paper introduced the working principle and design calculation of the clamp frames for cement bonded particle board production.

sentences.english: Moreover we provide the new design of the EGUN.

sentences.english: Self-directed learning may open a new avenue for us.

sentences.english: The 3rd, be good at thinking, baconian solution inscribes train of thought and method.

sentences.english: This paper summarizes Drofessor Fan Zhongze' clinical experience in the differentiation and treatment of intestinal cancer.

sentences.english: And also recommend my tutor"s thoughts and experience to treat this disease at the same time."

sentences.english: Bashed on this, the core thought of this paper comes into being.

sentences.english: Unique Packaging, a highly visual sourcebook, shows the contemporary work of important international package designers.

sentences.english: The system hardware circuity and software programming concept are presented in detail.

sentences.english: Energy saving and loss reduction are significant considerations of Chinas power grid companies for rural power supply.

sentences.english: It is concluded that the theory of slope break is a new thought of looking for non-structural reservoir.

sentences.english: The(idea) to implement software resource sharing is server-based computing technology.

sentences.english: I believe this is a viable way to resume the talks.
